top_questions.text: A sequential data file called "STUDENT.DAT" has stored data under the field heading Registration No., Class, Section, Name, Date of Birth and Gender. Write a program to display all the information of class NINE students whose gender is 'FEMALE'. [4]
What do you mean by field property in MS Access? List any two field properties with example.​
What is DBMS? List its two functions.​
Which data type is used to store paragraph in MS-Access?​ f) What is the use of CALL statement in modular programming?
